title: Trump Unloads On Fake News Media: The Biden Family Was Paid Off!
text:
President Donald Trump shared his frustrations with the Democrats' ongoing impeachment saga, calling the mainstream media's reporting as "fake news."

"The fake news must stop making excuses for something that is totally inexcusable," he said in a tweet.

It is INCREDIBLE to watch and read the Fake News and how they pull out all stops to protect Sleepy Joe Biden and his thrown out of the Military son, Hunter, who was handed $100,000 a month (Plus,Plus) from a Ukrainian based company, even though he had no experience in energy,... — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 6, 2019

....and separately got 1.5 Billion Dollars from China despite no experience and for no apparent reason. There is NO WAY these can be legitimate transactions? As lawyers & others have stated, as President, I have an OBLIGATION to look into possible, or probable, CORRUPTION! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 6, 2019

The Biden family was PAID OFF, pure and simple! The fake news must stop making excuses for something that is totally inexcusable. Sleepy Joe said he never spoke to the Ukrainian company, and then the picture came out where he was playing golf with the company boss and Hunter..... — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 6, 2019

....And by the way, I would LOVE running against 1% Joe Biden - I just don’t think it’s going to happen. Sleepy Joe won’t get to the starting gate, & based on all of the money he & his family probably “extorted,” Joe should hang it up. I wouldn’t want him dealing with China & U! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 6, 2019

Democrats launched an impeachment into Trump over a call he had with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky. During the call, Trump asked Zelensky to look into the Bidens' dealings. While Vice President Joe Biden was handling foreign relations with Ukraine on behalf of the United States, his son, Hunter, was being paid $50,000 a month by a Ukrainian oil company, despite having no natural energy experience. Democrats have said Trump threatened to withhold military aid unless Zelensky launched a probe but an unclassified, unredacted transcript of the call shows that to be false.
